Name: Base Station License, Courtesy Car Service, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Courtesy Car Service, submitted as Courtesy Car Service, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Courtesy Car Service, submitted as Courtesy Car Service, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 1750A East Tremont Avenue in the borough of The Bronx is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#935
